Body: When I connect my android mobile to my laptop, I use the 3G data via USB tethering. Several background activities on my laptop (win 8.1) such as regular updates continuously occur. This drains the monthly package and the allotted download/upload limit is exhausted in no time. Is there an android app that monitors the tethered connection and deny/block background downloading, say of any file(s) larger than 5-10MB?
Title: Android app to limit data download when tethering
